column5: I am curious to know if the carp die off is only happening in L.Simcoe, or have any of the Kawartha's been hit as well?
Kawarthas got hit really hard last year but I have not heard if they got hit again this year. Does anyone know what is causing this latest die-off?

Seems to be spreading from Simcoe to Couch & Sparrow....haven't heard of any die off in Kawartha's. They sent dead carp to Guelph to be tested-took a long time last year but to check if its same virus should be quicker.  Did it last about 10 days in most lakes last year?
No sign of a carp die off on Rice.
I've been fishing at the Narrows the past couple of days and every once in a while I'll see one come floating by out of Simcoe through the Narrows.
Haven't seen any Chemong speed bumps lately, but some local geocachers reported a boatload of em a few days ago.  Dunno exact locations, guessing somewhere on the Trent in the Hastings/Havelock area.

If you followed the trail of carp deaths from last year you would of seen the path it was taking, from south-east to north-west through the K's. This year into Simcoe , Couch and so on.  It will pass!
They just said that the trent system has them now.
